about.me.title: ⓘ About Me.
about.me.who.am.i:
I'm Jordan Wootton. A 24 year old Software Developer from London Ontario Canada..

Hard-working college graduate in Computer Programming Analyst (4.0 GPA). Aiming to leverage academic and workplace experience (4 years) with a proven knowledge of coding a variety of different languages to successfully fill the Programmer role at your company.

Frequently praised as quality-oriented by my peers, I am reliable and determined to partner with you and your company to achieve its goals.
experience.desc.1d: Create an inspiring team environment with an open communication.
experience.desc.1e: Listen to team members feedback and resolve any issues or conflicts.
experience.desc.3a: Java EE Application Development; usage of Eclipse, PostgreSQL, Wildfly/JBOSS, Gitea)
experience.desc.3b: Standardize Local App Installation and update processes through a standardized VBScript.
experience.desc.3c: Develop class to allow for parameterized queries in VBA. (Usage in both MS-ACE/PostgreSQL).
experience.desc.3e: Mainframe scrape efficiency of 75% savings through various techniques.
experience.desc.4a: Java EE Application Development; usage of Eclipse, PostgreSQL, Wildfly/JBOSS, Gitea)
experience.desc.4b: On-board various students and staff into programming practices.
experience.desc.4c: Assist with selection/hiring process for technical staff.
experience.desc.4d: Generate technical quality based reports of regional work.
education.desc.1a: Introduction to Object Oriented Programming - Java Swing
education.desc.2b: Component Based Programming With .NET / C# Advanced Topics.
education.desc.2c: Software Design Patterns I/II (Gang of Four).
education.desc.2e: Rational Databases & SQL (Oracle, MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MSAccess).
